title: Madrid to keep direct rule of Catalonia if Puigdemont reelected - PM
text:
Madrid to keep direct rule of Catalonia if Puigdemont reelected - PM   00:47 
Spanish PM Mariano Rajoy said it's a case of ''sheer common sense'' that Madrid will continue direct rule if former leader Puigdemont is voted back into power while he's in self-imposed exile in Brussels. Rough cut (no reporter narration).
